forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind 20 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West northwest wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the sunlight dances playfully on the skyline, casting a warm glow against the cool breezes that flow in from the west. With temperatures hovering around the comfortable 60-degree mark and a gentle wind stirring at 20 to 24 mph, this afternoon presents a brisk yet invigorating environment, ideal for a leisurely stroll through the city’s unique neighborhoods. The air is crisp, with nary a trace of the infamous fog; today, the view is clear, revealing the Golden Gate Bridge standing proud against the backdrop of a mostly blue sky punctuated by a few fluffy clouds.

As twilight approaches, expect the sky to transition to a serene canvas of blues and soft whites, with overnight lows settling near 49 degrees. A more subdued wind, though still fresh, will accompany the evening. It’s a splendid opportunity to don a light jacket or a cozy sweater as you find a spot at one of the local cafés, absorbing the last vestiges of daylight while the city begins to twinkle around you. Alternatively, a stroll along the Embarcadero, listening to the gentle lapping of the bay’s waters, would be equally rewarding. With such inviting conditions, the day beckons you to engage with the vibrant life of the city, making the most of this enchanting spring afternoon.
